Smart Health Plus.description: Smart Health Plus is our most comprehensive health insurance plan designed to provide 360-degree protection for you and your family. With a wide network of 10,000+ hospitals and a high claim settlement ratio, it ensures peace of mind during medical emergencies.
benefits: Cashless treatment at 10,000+ network hospitals
No sub-limits on room rent
Coverage for pre and post hospitalization expenses
Annual health check-ups for all insured members
exclusions: Injury due to war or nuclear weapons

faqs.question: What is the waiting period for pre-existing diseases?
faqs.answer: The waiting period for pre-existing diseases is 2 years from the date of policy issuance.

faqs.question: Is there a limit on room rent?
faqs.answer: No, this plan comes with no sub-limits on room rent, allowing you to choose any room category.

Secure Drive Pro.description: Secure Drive Pro offers ultimate protection for your vehicle with extensive coverage and zero depreciation benefits. It's designed for drivers who want the best-in-class service and hassle-free claim settlements.
benefits: Zero depreciation cover for parts replacement
Engine protection against water ingression
Roadside assistance available 24/7
Consumables cover included
inclusions: Protection against theft and natural calamities
exclusions: Wear and tear and general aging of the vehicle
Driving under the influence of alcohol

faqs.question: What is NCB (No Claim Bonus)?
faqs.answer: NCB is a discount given on the premium for every claim-free year.

faqs.question: What does Zero Depreciation cover?
faqs.answer: It ensures that you receive the full claim amount without any deduction for depreciation on parts.

Ultimate Life Shield.description: Ultimate Life Shield provides a robust financial safety net for your family. It offers high sum insured at affordable premiums, ensuring your loved ones are protected in your absence.
benefits: High sum insured up to â‚¹5 Crores
Terminal illness benefit included
Flexible payout options (Lump sum or Monthly)
Tax benefits under Section 80C
exclusions: Suicide within the first 12 months of the policy
Death due to involvement in criminal acts
Death due to participation in hazardous sports

faqs.question: Till what age can I get life cover?
faqs.answer: You can get cover up to the age of 85 years depending on the policy term chosen.

faqs.question: Can I increase my cover later?
faqs.answer: Yes, some plans offer the option to increase the sum insured at key life stages like marriage or childbirth.

Superior Life Plan.description: Superior Life Plan is a high-value term insurance designed for individuals who want maximum protection with flexible options. It provides comprehensive coverage against life's uncertainties.
benefits: Death benefit with multiple payout options
Critical illness rider included
Waiver of premium on accidental total permanent disability
Special rates for female lives and non-smokers
exclusions: Death due to war or civil commotion
Pre-existing conditions unless declared and accepted

faqs.question: Can I add riders to this plan?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can add Accidental Death Benefit, Critical Illness, and Waiver of Premium riders.

Critical Care Plus.description: Critical Care Plus is a specialized health plan that provides a lump sum benefit on the diagnosis of major critical illnesses, helping you manage both medical and living expenses during recovery.
benefits: Lump sum payout on first diagnosis of 32 critical illnesses
Financial security to maintain lifestyle during treatment
Tax benefits under Section 80D
No medical checkup up to 45 years of age
exclusions: Any illness diagnosed within the first 90 days (waiting period)
Illnesses due to pre-existing conditions (covered after 4 years)

faqs.question: How many illnesses are covered?
faqs.answer: This plan covers 32 major critical illnesses.
